channel.title: [Fz] Forbidden Zone [Fz]
channel.description:
[Insert Cool-looking banner] If someone could design me a banner it would be greatly appreciated.
[center]Hi, Moparscape, Jonathan here aka, Milkman with my first ever development thread.
[b]About The Server[/b]
The server I am working on is a Shard base, I am using Creativescape's source mainly because it doesn't have sql integration and I love the combat. Loads more PKing variety will be added as the stats are now 199.
[b]The Story Line[/b]
It seems you have been working on a molecular teleportation code and have accidentally stumbled into the Forbidden Zone. When you first spawn, you meet a stranger who gives you a rundown of the situation, a tour around the Fz and a short QA. You learn that person giving you the tour is the creator of your world and this one. He has a twin brother, the Wise Old Man but he calls him Skippy. The Wise Old Man looks after the Forbidden Zone.
Here's a video of the tutorial I worked on last night. Still needs work but the hard code has been finished. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7nMRiWSaC4g]Forbidden Zone Tutorial[/url]
[b]Goals[/b]
-I plan on hosting this server once I feel it has enough content to keep users happy for 2 weeks -Learn more about Java -Code every skill correctly (including Hunter and Construction from scratch) -Release tutorials for Shard so it becomes more widely used -Have an incredibly unique server that just barely could be called a RSPS -Load npcs, objects, and players from sql database so it loads quicker, server currently loads in 8 seconds -Eventually, move away from Runescape's game engine and create my own Engine and Framework, not using any of Jagex's property (Long Term Goal)
[b] Update Log [/b] [code] July 23 = Almost finished Tutorial Island, about 80% (need to add custom npcs to dialogues) July 24 = Changed stall thieving timer to be a bit quicker July 24 = Starting on a Custom Quest (Legion) July 26 = Finished Dialogues and Handler code for the quest July 26 = Changed maxed stat level to 199. Max CB level is 254. I'd like to hear your feedback July 28 = Finished the "Pig Horde" part of the "Legion" Quest July 28 = Changed ALL equipment requirements July 28 = Fixed the 199/99 and is now 199/199 July 28 = Food now heals double (may change) July 28 = Paused work on development for football August 14 = Brought the thread up to date August 14 = Continued work on development [/code] [b]Media[/b] Recent update: Max Stat is 199, better hits = more fun? Right or wrong, I'd like to hear your opinion. [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/30v13mc.gif[/img]
Skills [Credits to R0cky for all of these] Fishing - [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2z6cdhc.png[/img] Firemaking - [img]http://i590.photobucket.com/albums/ss343/R0cky0wnz/Untitled.gif?t=1241177175[/img] Woodcutting - [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/23jmpfr.jpg[/img]
[b] I will upload my own media once I can get back on my Desktop [/b] [/center]

item.title: [Fz] Forbidden Zone [Fz]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:38, topic:406189”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=503185.msg3710956#msg3710956 date=1313350094]

No not really. I changed it to 10000x rate so it gets hard around level 160.

oh, well that makes everything changed about what I was thinking, but 199 max skills isnt good, I gave myself 200/99 str on my old rsps, I hit like i had a maxed out p ring (in pvp). At about 150 or 190 people will or can hit instant 99s.
[/quote]

That’s the idea. High hits but also high defence. It gives more flexibility to do different strategies like, 100 defence, 199 str, 1 attack. or 199 range and 199 str. It just adds more variety is what I’m trying to say. Debating whether or not to add another armour after barrows. I know I said no customs but might have to since I want a wider variety.

Fixed it so it’s now 199/199 in the skills menu.[/quote]

Totally forgot about the def, I guess it evens it all out, but what’s the maxed out skill levels including drinking a pot?

Read full topic

That’s the idea. High hits but also high defence. It gives more flexibility to do different strategies like, 100 defence, 199 str, 1 attack. or 199 range and 199 str. It just adds more variety is what I’m trying to say. Debating whether or not to add another armour after barrows. I know I said no customs but might have to since I want a wider variety.

Fixed it so it’s now 199/199 in the skills menu.

item.title: [Fz] Forbidden Zone [Fz]
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:24, topic:406189”]Go milky. Did you sort out the quest tab? I’ll help you sort it out if you haven’t.

Just some suggestions:

199/99? You’re missing something out.
If Attack and strength go to 199, make sure HP does as well.

@Squirt: with 98 stats levelling to 99, you can hit slightly better than 98. Then when you level to level 100, you can hit slightly better than level 99. Etc. all the way to 199, so you won’t have to change anything.

I love CreativeScape, the only thing is the dead lock you get sometimes in combat.[/quote]

it just doesnt feel right, im sure itll cause alot of trouble

Read full topic

item.title: [Fz] Forbidden Zone [Fz]
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:26, topic:406189”] if (xp > 200000000) {//200m xp = 200000000; }

That variable, right?

if (xp > 2147000000) {//2.147b
xp = 2147000000;
}

Just change it?[/quote]

Yeah, I set the max xp level to stop at 2.146b.
Might set an achievement and a reward for people who finally train there stat to that level.

Unfortunately I couldn’t get the Quest Tab sorted. There has got to be a code somewhere that I am missing. I was searching in Player.java and found this

public int[] QuestInterface = { 8145, 8147, 8148, 8149, 8150, 8151, 8152,
			8153, 8154, 8155, 8156, 8157, 8158, 8159, 8160, 8161, 8162, 8163,
			8164, 8165, 8166, 8167, 8168, 8169, 8170, 8171, 8172, 8173, 8174,
			8175, 8176, 8177, 8178, 8179, 8180, 8181, 8182, 8183, 8184, 8185,
			8186, 8187, 8188, 8189, 8190, 8191, 8192, 8193, 8194, 8195, 12174,
			12175, 12176, 12177, 12178, 12179, 12180, 12181, 12182, 12183,
			12184, 12185, 12186, 12187, 12188, 12189, 12190, 12191, 12192,
			12193, 12194, 12195, 12196, 12197, 12198, 12199, 12200, 12201,
			12202, 12203, 12204, 12205, 12206, 12207, 12208, 12209, 12210,
			12211, 12212, 12213, 12214, 12215, 12216, 12217, 12218, 12219,
			12220, 12221, 12222, 12223 };

Not sure if it does anything to the quest tab.

I found this also in Client.java

	public void sendQuestTab(){
		actionAssistant2.sendQuestTab();
	}

Might have to change that around. Going to play with it a little bit.

Can’t find a playerAssistant. I’m not missing anything in playerConstants or playerDetails.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

199/99 is incorrect. Somewhere in your player class it will state max level is 99. That is why it shows 199/99. What you need to do is change it to 199 or whatever your max level is going to be.

Read full topic

I love CreativeScape, the only thing is the dead lock you get sometimes in combat.

item.title: [Fz] Forbidden Zone [Fz]
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Squirt Ltd, post:18, topic:406189”]you will also be able to fucking rape npcs with those stats
and youll need more weapons, armor etc and magic will need more spells
& fletching magic longbows till 199? slow xp, hard to get a huge amount like that except if you put everything in shops wich will fuck up the eco
and it will be alot harder in wildy to find someone ur lvl[/quote]

Npcs will be given twice the hp, there stats will be doubled as well. Skill requirements will also be doubled.

I will have to determine the appropriate xp rate. Thinking 1000x but I have to do some tests and see where it takes me. I want it to get a bit hard to start leveling around level 140.
